Text:
The Lz0 patch doesn't seem to work for me. Could someone please write a few thorough instructions on how to get this patch to fix the "reregistration" pop-up window to show up and then launch the software correctly.
Thanks

Could someone please post some instructions on how to use this patch. It doesn't seem to work for me, I still get the registration pop-up window when I've finished patching the airparrot.app and launch the software..

Thanks

Once you patch the app (By dragging and dropping the AirParrot app from your Application folder) copy the registration code (Generated in the keygen under the name "Linezer0", paste it in the registration field in the AirParrot app, click "Register" then you should be good to go.
Thank you very much works perfect
Thankyou some much. i have a 2010 imac Mountain Lion works fine
The Keygen didnÂ´t work for me. My montain lion blocked it. I need some keys... anyone? Please?
Hi OpenArena... The keyGen doesn't work under 10.6.8....  It's asking me to upgrade my OS, and to be honest, I was hoping not having to. Any chance that the key gen can be downgraded? Thanks!
Hey, You say that the requirements for this is 10.6 or later. I am using Mac OS X 10.6.8 and it says that it needs 10.7 or later. Is there way around this, or can the keygen be downgraded? Thanks!
Awesome App!  Worked great for me, no problems!
Thank U SOO MUCH!!! Works like a charm! My Air was bought last oct but it was not "new enough" to support airplay in Mountain Lion. But now it works anyway! Thanks again!
